title: Bold script
content:
Please can you identify the 'Mollyslost' font?

[http://www.mollyslost.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107162226/http:/www.mollyslost.com/ "http://www.mollyslost.com/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [molly.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107162226/http:/typophile.com/files/molly.jpg) | 13.6 KB |
author: lprahalad

comments.content:
Another old script.  
Matches [Ariston Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107162226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ariston-bq/), designed by M. Wilke for Berthold in the mid 1930s.  
Don
